trans-unit.source: Provides access to get and set option values for a designer.
trans-unit.target: Gir tilgang til å hente og angi verdiene for en designer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables in-place editing for <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som aktiverer eller deaktiverer direkte redigering <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> kontroller.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if in-place editing for <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> controls is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis direkte redigering for <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> kontroller er aktivert, ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the dimensions of a grid unit.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer størrelsen på en enhet for rutenett.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the dimensions of a grid unit.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer størrelsen på en enhet for rutenett.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a designer shows a component's smart tag panel automatically on creation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en designer viser en komponent smart koden panelet automatisk på oppretting.

trans-unit.source: A component's smart tag panel is set to automatically open when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.AutoShow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: En komponent smart koden panelet er satt til å åpne automatisk når den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.AutoShow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.AutoShow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow a component's smart tag panel to open automatically upon creation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>tillate en komponent smart koden panelet skal åpnes automatisk når det er opprettet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables the grid in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som aktiverer eller deaktiverer rutenettet i utformeren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the grid is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis rutenettet er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables whether controls are automatically placed at grid coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som aktiverer eller deaktiverer om kontroller automatisk er plassert i rutenettet koordinater.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if snapping is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis festing er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables the component cache.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som aktiverer eller deaktiverer hurtigbufferen for komponenten.

trans-unit.source: The component cache is a performance enhancement that is incompatible with certain designers.
trans-unit.target: Hurtigbufferen for komponenten er en utvidelse av ytelse som er inkompatibelt med bestemte utviklere.

trans-unit.source: You can disable it with this property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deaktivere den med denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component cache is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis hurtigbufferen komponenten er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables smart tags in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som aktiverer eller deaktiverer smart koder i designer.

trans-unit.source: This option is not exposed on the **Options** item of the **Tools** menu in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Dette alternativet er ikke eksponert på den **alternativer** element av den **verktøy** -menyen i [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if smart tags in the designer are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis smart koder i designer er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables snaplines in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som aktiverer eller deaktiverer snaplines i designer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if snaplines in the designer are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis snaplines i designer er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
